title: Drawing, "DragonOil (Black and White on Blue)", after 1980
medium: Blue, purple and black marker, white colored pencil, graphite on white tracing paper
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Design for logo. The word DRAGONOIL in thick, san-serif block capital letters placed on blue and purple rectangle in center of sheet. The word dragon in black; oil in white. Blue and purple markers applied on the verso of the sheet. Rectangle outlined in graphite on recto.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "DragonOil (Black and White on Blue)", after 1980.
after 1980. Blue, purple and black marker, white colored pencil, graphite on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-382.
